meanings.definition: To make an effort to achieve or complete something.
meanings.sent1: She will attempt to climb the tree.
meanings.sent2: He always attempts to solve puzzles quickly.
meanings.sent3: The cat will attempt to catch the laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: The student attempted to reach the highest grade in the class.
meanings.sent5: The chef will attempt to create a new recipe for the menu.

meanings.definition: An act of trying to do something, typically with the intention of succeeding.
meanings.sent1: Her attempt to bake a cake was successful.
meanings.sent2: The team made an attempt to score a goal.
meanings.sent3: The clown's attempt to juggle eggs was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: His attempt to break the record was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The artist's attempt to paint a masterpiece was inspiring.
